rules.title: School Rules
items: Attendance is required for all scheduled classes unless you have a written excuse from the school office.
Official deadlines for course adds, drops, and withdrawals follow the academic calendar posted by the registrar.
Use of AI tools for assignments must follow course policies; always cite approved tools and sources.
ID badges must be worn on campus and presented to staff when requested.

rights.title: Student Rights
items: You can request an official copy of the code of conduct from Student Affairs at any time.
You have the right to appeal disciplinary decisions within 10 business days of notification.
Academic accommodation requests are reviewed confidentially by the accessibility office.
All grades can be reviewed through the registrar if you submit a formal reconsideration request.

help.title: What Should I Do?
items: If you miss a class or assessment, notify your instructor and submit the absence form within two days.
For safety issues on campus, call campus security and report the incident number to Student Affairs.
Update your address, phone number, and emergency contacts through the student portal each term.
Schedule advising by booking through the advising portal or visiting the advising desk in person.
